bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names yan mei si 魘寐死 ; yan mei bao si 魘寐暴絕 , sudden cut-off because of nightmare demons. Pathological Condition of cu si 卒死 , sudden [appearance of] death, resulting from bad dreams while one is asleep. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 25: 治魘死不自覺者方：慎燈火 , 勿令人手動 , 牽牛 臨其上即覺 , “Recipe to cure [appearance of] death from nightmares and unconsciousness: Be careful not to expose [the victim] to a shining light, and let no one touch him. Lead a buffalo to stand above him, and he will regain consciousness”.
